title: Salzburg, Austria
description: At top, the central part of the city shown from the north. Hoen-Salzburg rises in the left middle distance. The upper parts of the Cathedral, the Franciscan Church, and the Kollegrenkirche are shown in the left foreground, across meadows, trees and houses. The Convent of the Ursulines is shown near the right edge. The Moenchsberg is in the right background, the Untersberg in the central background.
name: Drawing
